title: Squire AFK (~lvl 70)
comment_one:
Priority is "Idle Skilling" > "Book of the Wise" then dmg talents.
*1 = As much as needed for the zone you want to afk in.
comment_two: Go for ~50 in each active skill, then you want to max "Carry A Big Stick", then mix "Absolute Unit" and "Strength in numbers".
comment_three:
Level the 4 active skills evenly on this tab
IMPORTANT: Do not activate balanced spirit, just put it on your bar and never ever click it
notes:
Active Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monsterâ€™s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier
Min Damage to cap Sand Giants with these active skills: 1700
